@param proxy representing the address of the proxy created

@title IRegistry

@dev This event will be emitted every time a new proxy is created

VersionAdded

addVersion
getFunction

devdoc.details: This contract represents the interface of a registry contract

addVersion(string,bytes4,address).details: Registers a new version of a function with its implementation address

params.func: representing the signature of the function to be registered
params.implementation: representing the address of the new function implementation to be registered
params.version: representing the version name of the new function implementation to be registered

addVersionFromName(string,string,address.details: Registers a new version of a function with its implementation address

params.func: representing the name of the function to be registered
params.implementation: representing the address of the new function implementation to be registered
params.version: representing the version name of the new function implementation to be registered

getFallback(string).details: Returns the the fallback function for a specific version, if registered

getFunction(string,bytes4).details: Tells the address of the function implementation for a given version

params.func: representing the signature of the function to be queried
params.version: representing the version of the function implementation to be queried

getFunction(string,bytes4).return: address of the function implementation registered for the given version

getFunctionByIndex(string,uint256).details: Returns a function name and implementation for a given version, given its index

getFunctionCount(string).details: Returns the number of functions (excluding the fallback function) registered for a specific version

devdoc.title: IRegistry
